10: Upper logic
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Upper logic: start
10_s2: Search enemies: players
10_s2_w0: [Search enemy] Character _ target setting
10_s3: Target action
10_s3_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s3_w0: [Operation] Lock on
10_s3_w1: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s3_w2: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s4: Action without target
